name: Domain Name Brainstormer
summary: Creative domain name generator that helps find memorable, brandable domain names for projects and checks availability across multiple TLDs (.com, .io, .dev, .ai, etc.)
when_to_use: User is starting a new project or company and needs a domain name
User wants creative domain name suggestions
User needs to check domain availability
User is rebranding and looking for new domain options
User's preferred domain is taken and needs alternatives
User wants brandable, memorable domain suggestions
when_not_to_use: User already has a domain and just needs to register it
User only needs DNS configuration help
User wants to transfer existing domain
User needs website hosting advice (not domain naming)
